titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide a case suitable for displaying the flag furnished with respect to deceased veterans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Memorial Affairs.

bill.summary: 4/21/1994--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, when requested, to provide a case suitable for displaying the U.S. flag furnished with respect to deceased veterans.
